changeSet.createView: select re.object_id as order_id, re.record_id as record_id, fc.container_id as form_id from catissue_form_record_entry re inner join catissue_form_context fc on fc.identifier = re.form_ctxt_id inner join os_orders o on o.identifier = re.object_id inner join catissue_distribution_protocol dp on dp.identifier = o.distribution_protocol_id where fc.entity_type = 'OrderExtension' and fc.deleted_on is null and re.activity_status = 'ACTIVE' and o.activity_status != 'Disabled' and (dp.order_extn_form_id is null or dp.order_extn_form_id = fc.container_id)

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.createView: select oi.identifier as identifier, o.identifier as order_id, o.name as name, o.distribution_protocol_id as dp_id, o.site_id as site_id, o.tracking_url as tracking_url, o.comments as comments, o.requester_id as requester_id, o.execution_date as execution_date, o.status as order_status, oi.quantity as quantity, oi.cost as cost, oi.status as status, oi.specimen_id as specimen_id from os_orders o inner join os_order_items oi on oi.order_id = o.identifier where o.activity_status != 'Disabled'

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.createView: select r.identifier as identifier, dp.short_title as dp_short_title, r.user_id as cancelled_by, r.event_time as cancellation_date, r.comments as comments from os_spmn_reserved_events r inner join catissue_distribution_protocol dp on dp.identifier = r.dp_id where r.cancelled_event_id is not null

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.createView: select re.identifier as identifier, s.identifier as specimen_id, dp.short_title as dp_short_title, re.event_time as event_time from os_spmn_reserved_events re inner join catissue_distribution_protocol dp on dp.identifier = re.dp_id inner join catissue_specimen s on s.reserved_event_id = re.identifier

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.createView: select cpr.identifier as identifier, sum(case when visit.collection_status = 'Complete' then 1 else 0 end) as visits_completed, sum(case when visit.collection_status = 'Missed Collection' then 1 else 0 end) as visits_missed, sum(case when ((visit.collection_status = 'Pending' or visit.identifier is null) and cpe.identifier is not null) then 1 else 0 end) as visits_pending from catissue_coll_prot_reg cpr left join catissue_coll_prot_event cpe on cpe.collection_protocol_id = cpr.collection_protocol_id and cpe.activity_status!= 'Disabled' left join catissue_specimen_coll_group visit on visit.collection_protocol_event_id = cpe.identifier and visit.collection_protocol_reg_id = cpr.identifier and visit.activity_status!= 'Disabled' group by cpr.identifier
